Text:
Evidently not working.

Runs fine, but will not run diagnostic test or allow profiling, which defeats the purpose of the crack. 

Not worth the download =/.

I don't know what v16 is talking about, this worked perfectly for me, plus this is a trusted uploader. Just must be flamming.This is worth the download if you need an app like this.A big thank you ilefx
Is the App in the crack folder/Zip to be pasted into the Program Files folder?  Instructions would've been nice.  I still appreciate the upload though

Installation didn't work for me either.  The cracked App still shows as Unregistered, plus my battery is so dead that it wont even complete an 11 minute scan without shutting down.  I guess going unplugged is no longer an option for me.
installed it on win 7 x64, program starts and is considered as activated, but when I try to run the diagnostic freezes and quits...
the thing works but when i wanted to had the battery optimizer it says it only works with a register member or what then was ask for a code and license name.. L:?
